# How to Report an Issue on GitHub: # Founga Fakahā ha Palopalema ʻi he GitHub
## Download Pretrained Models: ## Download e Ngaahi Mōtele kuo Akoʻi Mua
1. Click on the 'Record Screen' button b: 1. Lomiʻi ʻi he meʻa-lomi 'Record Screen' ʻi lalo ke kamata hiki ʻa e palopalema ʻokú ke fehangahangai mo ia.
2. Once you have finished recording the: 2. ʻI hoʻo ʻosi hiki e palopalema, lomiʻi ʻi he meʻa-lomi 'Stop Recording' (ko e meʻa-lomi tatau pē, ka ʻoku liliu ʻa e hingoa ʻo fakatatau pe ʻokú ke lolotonga hiki pe ʻikai).
3. ʻAlu ki he [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/issues) pea lomiʻi ʻi he meʻa-lomi 'New Issue'.
4. Complete the provided issue template,: 4. Fakakakato ʻa e sīpinga palopalema kuo ʻoatu, fakapapauʻi ke fakakau ʻa e ngaahi fakaikiiki ʻoku fiemaʻu, pea ngāueʻaki ʻa e konga ʻo e ngaahi koloa ke ʻupload ʻa e faile naʻe hiki mei he sitepu kimuʻa.
A simple, high-quality voice conversion: Ko ha meʻangāue faingofua, maʻolunga hono tuʻunga ki he liliu leʻo ʻoku tokanga taha ki he faingofua ʻo e ngāueʻaki mo e lavameʻa.
Adding several silent files to the train: Ko hono tānaki ha ngaahi faile longo ki he seti ako ʻoku ne ʻai ke malava ʻe he mōtele ke ngāueʻaki ʻa e longo kakato ʻi he ngaahi faile ongo kuo fakafehokotaki. Fili ʻa e 0 kapau ʻoku maʻa hoʻo seti fakamatalá pea kuo ʻosi ʻi ai ha ngaahi konga longo kakato.
Adjust the input audio pitch to match th: Fakatatau ʻa e māʻolunga ʻo e ongo ʻoku hū mai ke fehoanaki mo e tuʻunga ʻo e mōtele leʻo.
Adjusting the position more towards one: Ko hono liliu ʻo e tuʻunga ke ofi ange ki he tafaʻaki ʻe taha pe ko e tafaʻaki ʻe taha ʻe ʻai ai ʻa e mōtele ke tatau ange mo e ʻuluaki pe ko e ua.
Adjusts the final volume of the converte: ʻOku ne fokotuʻu ʻa e leʻo fakaʻosi ʻo e leʻo kuo liliu ʻi he hili ʻa e ngāueʻi.
Adjusts the input volume before processi: ʻOku ne fokotuʻu ʻa e leʻo huʻu kimuʻa pea ngāueʻi. ʻOkú ne taʻofi e kosi pe fakaʻāsili ha maika leʻo siʻi.
Adjusts the volume of the monitor feed,: ʻOku ne fokotuʻu ʻa e leʻo ʻo e fafanga fakaʻaliʻali, ʻo tuʻu mavahe mei he ʻaútiputi tefitó.
Amount of extra audio processed to provi: Ko e lahi ʻo e ongo fakalahi ʻoku ngāueʻi ke ʻoatu ha fakamatala ki he sīpingá. ʻOkú ne fakalakalaka e tuʻunga lelei ʻo e liliú kae lahi ange ai e fakamole ʻo e CPU.
Pea fili ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e sampling.
Apply a soft autotune to your inferences: Ngāueʻaki ha autotune molū ki hoʻo ngaahi fakafehokotaki, ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he ngaahi liliu hiva.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e bitcrush ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e chorus ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e clipping ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e compressor ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e toloi ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e distortion ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e tupu ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e fakangatangata ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e liliu māʻolunga ʻo e leʻo ki he ongo.
Ngāueʻaki ʻa e reverb ki he ongo.
Audio buffer size in milliseconds. Lower: Lahi ʻo e puha fakahaofi ʻo e ongó ʻi he milisekoni. Ko e mahuʻinga maʻulaló ʻe lava ke ne fakasiʻisiʻi e toloí kae fakaʻāsili e kavenga ʻo e CPU.
Audio file slicing method: Select 'Skip': Founga ki hono kosi ʻo e faile ongo: Fili ʻa e 'Skip' kapau kuo ʻosi kosi fakakongokonga ʻa e ngaahi faile, 'Simple' kapau kuo ʻosi toʻo ʻa e longo lahi fau mei he ngaahi faile, pe 'Automatic' ki he ʻiloʻi longo fakaʻotometiki pea kosi takai ai.
Audio normalization: Select 'none' if th: Fakatonutonu ʻo e Ongo: Fili ʻa e 'none' kapau kuo ʻosi fakatonutonu ʻa e ngaahi faile, 'pre' ke fakatonutonu ʻa e faile hū kotoa ʻi he taimi pē ʻe taha, pe 'post' ke fakatonutonu fakatāutaha ʻa e konga kosi takitaha.
Bitcrush Bit Depth: Loloto ʻo e Bit ʻo e Bitcrush
Browse presets for formanting: Kumi ha ngaahi preset ki he formanting
Cache Dataset in GPU: Tauhi e Seti Fakamatalá ʻi he GPU
Cache the dataset in GPU memory to speed: Tauhi e seti fakamatalá ʻi he manatu ʻo e GPU ke fakavaveʻi ʻa e founga ako.
Check for updates: Sivi ki ha ngaahi fakamatala fakamuimuitaha
Check which version of Applio is the lat: Sivi pe ko fē ʻa e vesini fakamuimuitaha ʻo e Applio ke sio pe ʻoku fiemaʻu ke ke fakamatala fakamuimuitaha.
Choose the model architecture:\n- **RVC:
Fili ʻa e fokotuʻutuʻu ʻo e mōtele:
- **RVC (V2)**: Filianga tuʻumaʻu, ʻoku fehoanaki mo e kau kasitoma kotoa.
- **Applio**: Tuʻunga fakalakalaka mo e ngaahi vocoder kuo fakaleleiʻi mo e tuʻunga sampling maʻolunga ange, ki he Applio pē.
Choose the vocoder for audio synthesis:\:
Fili ʻa e vocoder ki he synthesis ʻo e ongo:
- **HiFi-GAN**: Filianga tuʻumaʻu, ʻoku fehoanaki mo e kau kasitoma kotoa.
- **MRF HiFi-GAN**: Tuʻunga faitotonu maʻolunga ange, ki he Applio pē.
- **RefineGAN**: Tuʻunga maʻolunga ange ʻo e ongo, ki he Applio pē.
Chorus Center Delay ms: Taimi Toloí ʻo e Lotomālie ʻo e Chorus (ms)
Clean your audio output using noise dete: Fakamaʻa hoʻo ongo ʻoku hū atu ʻaki hono ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi founga ʻiloʻi longoaʻa, ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he ngaahi ongo lea.
Clear Outputs (Deletes all audios in ass: Toʻo ʻa e Ngaahi Ola (Tāmateʻi ʻa e ngaahi ongo kotoa ʻi he assets/audios)
Click the refresh button to see the pret: Lomiʻi ʻa e meʻa-lomi fakafoʻou ke sio ki he faile kuo akoʻi mua ʻi he lisi toho hifo.
Default value is 1.0: Ko e mahuʻinga tuʻumaʻu ko e 1.0
Detect overtraining to prevent the model: ʻIloʻi ʻa e ako lahi fau ke taʻofi ʻa e mōtele mei heʻene ako lelei fau ʻa e fakamatalá pea mole ai ʻa e malava ke fakaʻaongaʻi ki he fakamatalá foʻou.
Determine at how many epochs the model w: Fakapapauʻi pe ko e fē ʻa e lahi ʻo e ngaahi epoch ʻe seivi ai ʻa e mōtele.
Drag and drop your model here: Toho mai pea lī hoʻo mōtele ki heni
Drag your .pth file and .index file into: Toho mai hoʻo faile .pth mo e faile .index ki he feituʻu ni. Toho mai ʻa e taha pea toki toho mai mo e taha.
Drag your plugin.zip to install it: Toho mai hoʻo plugin.zip ke fola ia
Duration of the fade between audio chunk: Ko e lōloa ʻo e mole māmālie ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi konga ongo ke taʻofi e ngaahi patapatá. Ko e mahuʻinga māʻolungá ʻokú ne fakatupu ha ngaahi liliu molū ange ka ʻe lava ke ne fakaʻāsili e toloí.
Enable Applio integration with Discord p: Fakangofua ʻa e fehokotaki ʻa e Applio mo e ʻi ai ʻa e Discord
Enable formant shifting. Used for male t: Fakangofua ʻa e liliu ʻo e formant. Ngāueʻaki ki he liliu mei he tangata ki he fefine pea pehē foki ki mui.
Enable this setting only if you are trai: Fakangofua pē ʻa e fekauʻaki ko ʻeni kapau ʻokú ke akoʻi ha mōtele foʻou mei he kamataʻanga pe kamata foʻou ʻa e ako. ʻOku ne tāmateʻi ʻa e ngaahi mamafa kotoa naʻe ngaohi kimuʻa mo e ngaahi loka tensorboard.
Enables Voice Activity Detection to only: ʻOkú ne fakangofua ʻa e ʻIloʻi ʻo e Ngāue ʻa e Leʻó ke ngāueʻi pē ʻa e ongó ʻi he taimi ʻokú ke leá ai, ʻo hao ai e CPU.
Enables memory-efficient training. This: ʻOku ne fakangofua ʻa e ako ʻoku lelei ki he manatu. ʻOku ne fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e ngāueʻaki ʻo e VRAM ka ʻoku ne fakatuai ʻa e vave ʻo e ako. ʻOku ʻaonga ia ki he ngaahi GPU ʻoku siʻisiʻi hono manatú (hange ko e, <6GB VRAM) pe ʻi he taimi ʻoku ako ai mo ha lahi ʻo e fanga ʻoku lahi ange ʻi he meʻa ʻoku malava ʻe hoʻo GPU ke fua.
Enabling this setting will result in the: Ko hono fakangofua ʻo e fekauʻaki ko ʻeni ʻe iku ai ki he seivi pē ʻe he ngaahi faile G mo D honau vesini fakamuimuitaha, ʻo ne maluʻi lelei ai ʻa e feituʻu tauhiʻanga.
Enter dataset name: Fakahuu e hingoa ʻo e seti fakamatalá
Enter model name: Fakahuu e hingoa ʻo e mōtele
Enter path to model: Fakahuu e hala ki he mōtele
Enter preset name: Fakahuu e hingoa ʻo e preset
Fakahuu ʻa e kupuʻilea ke synthesize.
Extract F0 Curve: Toʻo Mai ʻa e Kave F0
Extract Features: Toʻo Mai ʻa e Ngaahi ʻUlungaanga
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific inp: Ki he kau fakaʻuli ʻa e ASIO, fili ha senolo huʻu pau. Tuku ia ʻi he -1 ki he tuʻunga angamahení.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific mon: Ki he kau fakaʻuli ʻa e ASIO, fili ha senolo ʻaútiputi fakaʻaliʻali pau. Tuku ia ʻi he -1 ki he tuʻunga angamahení.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific out: Ki he kau fakaʻuli ʻa e ASIO, fili ha senolo ʻaútiputi pau. Tuku ia ʻi he -1 ki he tuʻunga angamahení.
For WASAPI (Windows), gives the app excl: Ki he WASAPI (Windows), ʻokú ne ʻoange ki he polokalamá ha mafai fakaʻataʻatā ke fakasiʻisiʻi e toloí.
Get information about the audio: Maʻu ha fakamatala fekauʻaki mo e ongo
I agree to the terms of use: ʻOku ou loto ki he ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni ngāueʻaki
Fakatokolahi pe fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e vave ʻo e TTS.
Influence exerted by the index file; a h: Ko e ivi ʻoku fakahoko ʻe he faile ʻinitekisí; ko ha mahuʻinga maʻolunga ange ʻoku fehoanaki ia mo ha ivi lahi ange. Kae kehe, ko hono fili ha ngaahi mahuʻinga maʻulalo ange ʻe lava ke tokoni ia ke fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hā ʻi he ongo.
Input path for text file: Hala hū mai ki he faile kupuʻilea
Introduce the model link: Fakahū ʻa e link ʻo e mōtele
Introduce the model pth path: Fakahū ʻa e hala ki he mōtele pth
It will activate the possibility of disp: ʻE fakamoʻui ai ʻa e malava ke fakahā ʻa e ngāue lolotonga ʻa e Applio ʻi he Discord.
It's advisable to align it with the avai: ʻOku lelei ke fakatatau ia mo e VRAM ʻoku maʻu ʻi hoʻo GPU. Ko ha fekauʻaki ʻo e 4 ʻoku ne ʻomi ha tonu lelei ange ka ʻoku tuai ange hono ngāueʻaki, lolotonga ia ʻoku ʻomi ʻe he 8 ha ngaahi ola vave ange mo tuʻumaʻu.
It's recommended keep deactivate this op: ʻOku fokotuʻu atu ke tuku pē ke mate ʻa e filianga ko ʻeni kapau kuo ʻosi ngāueʻaki hoʻo seti fakamatalá.
It's recommended to deactivate this opti: ʻOku fokotuʻu atu ke tāmateʻi ʻa e filianga ko ʻeni kapau kuo ʻosi ngāueʻaki hoʻo seti fakamatalá.
KMeans is a clustering algorithm that di: Ko e KMeans ko ha founga fakakulupu ia ʻoku ne vahevahe ʻa e seti fakamatalá ki he ngaahi kulupu K. ʻOku ʻaonga lahi ʻa e fekauʻaki ko ʻeni ki he ngaahi seti fakamatalá lalahi.
Length of the audio slice for 'Simple' m: Lōloa ʻo e konga ongo ki he founga 'Simple'.
Length of the overlap between slices for: Lōloa ʻo e feʻunaʻaki ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi konga ki he founga 'Simple'.
Male voice models typically use 155.0 an: ʻOku faʻa ngāueʻaki ʻe he ngaahi mōtele leʻo tangata ʻa e 155.0 pea ʻoku faʻa ngāueʻaki ʻe he ngaahi mōtele leʻo fefine ʻa e 255.0.
Model Author Name: Hingoa ʻo e Tokotaha Ngaohi Mōtele

Overtraining Threshold: Tuʻunga Fakangatangata ʻo e Ako Lahi Fau
Hala ki he tōʻanga faile ʻo e seti fakamatalá.

Pitch Shift Semitones: Semitone Liliu ʻo e Māʻolunga ʻo e Leʻo
Pitch extraction algorithm: Founga toʻo mai ʻo e māʻolunga ʻo e leʻo
Pitch extraction algorithm to use for th: Founga toʻo mai ʻo e māʻolunga ʻo e leʻo ke ngāueʻaki ki he liliu ongo. Ko e founga tuʻumaʻu ko e rmvpe, ʻa ia ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he lahi taha ʻo e ngaahi tūkunga.
Please ensure compliance with the terms: Kātaki fakapapauʻi hoʻo talangofua ki he ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni mo e ngaahi fepaki ʻoku fakaikiiki ʻi he [tohi ko ʻeni](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) kimuʻa pea ke hoko atu mo hoʻo fakafehokotaki.

Kātaki fakapapauʻi ʻa e muimui ki he ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni mo e ngaahi fepaki ʻoku fakaikiiki ʻi he [tohi ko ʻení](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) kimuʻa pea ke hoko atu mo hoʻo fengaueʻaki taimi totonú.

Kātaki fakapapauʻi hoʻo talangofua ki he ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni mo e ngaahi fepaki ʻoku fakaikiiki ʻi he [tohi ko ʻeni](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) kimuʻa pea ke hoko atu mo hoʻo ako.
Post-process the audio to apply effects: Ngāueʻi hili ia ʻa e ongo ke fakaʻaongaʻi ha ngaahi ola ki he meʻa ʻoku hū atu.
Preprocess Dataset: Ngāueʻi Kimuʻa ʻa e Seti Fakamatalá
Presets are located in /assets/formant_s: ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e ngaahi preset ʻi he tōʻanga faile /assets/formant_shift
Proposed Pitch: Māʻolunga ʻo e Leʻo kuo Fokotuʻu Atu
Proposed Pitch Threshold: Tuʻunga Fakangatangata ʻo e Māʻolunga ʻo e Leʻo kuo Fokotuʻu Atu
Protect Voiceless Consonants: Maluʻi ʻa e Ngaahi Konisonanite ʻIkai Ongo
Quefrency for formant shifting: Quefrency ki he liliu ʻo e formant
Refresh Custom Pretraineds: Fakafoʻou ʻa e Ngaahi Akoʻi Mua Fakafoʻituitui
Reverb Room Size: Lahi ʻo e Loki ʻo e Reverb
Safeguard distinct consonants and breath: Maluʻi ʻa e ngaahi konisonanite makehe mo e ngaahi ongo mānavá ke taʻofi ʻa e mahae fakaʻilekitulōnika-fakaongo mo e ngaahi meʻa kehe. Ko hono toho ʻo e fakangatangatá ki hono tuʻunga māʻolunga taha ʻo e 0.5 ʻokú ne ʻomi ha maluʻi kakato. Kae kehe, ko hono fakasiʻisiʻi ʻo e mahuʻinga ko ʻení ʻe lava ke ne fakasiʻisiʻi ai ʻa e tuʻunga maluʻí kae malava ke ne fakasiʻisiʻi ai ʻa e ola ʻo e ʻinitekisí.
Save Every Epoch: Seivi ʻa e Epoch Kotoa Pē
Save Every Weights: Seivi ʻa e Mamafa Kotoa Pē

Select the language you want to use. (Re: Fili ʻa e lea ʻokú ke loto ke ngāueʻaki. (ʻOku fiemaʻu ke toe kamataʻi ʻa e Applio)
Select the microphone or audio interface: Fili e maikafoní pe ko e vahaʻa fehokotakiʻanga ongo te ke lea aí.

Select the voice model to use for the co: Fili ʻa e mōtele leʻo ke ngāueʻaki ki he liliu.

Set the autotune strength - the more you: Fokotuʻu ʻa e mālohi ʻo e autotune - ko e lahi ange hoʻo fakatokolahi ia ko e lahi ange ia ʻene piki ki he keli faka-kalasi.

Fokotuʻu ʻa e founga fakamomoko ʻo e reverb.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e taimi tukuange ʻo e fakangatangata.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e tuʻunga fakangatangata ʻo e fakangatangata (dB).
Set the maximum number of epochs you wan: Fokotuʻu ʻa e lahi taha ʻo e ngaahi epoch ʻokú ke loto ke tuku ʻe hoʻo mōtele ʻa e ako kapau ʻoku ʻikai ha fakalakalaka ʻe ʻiloʻi.
Set the pitch of the audio, the higher t: Fokotuʻu ʻa e māʻolunga ʻo e leʻo ʻo e ongo, ko e maʻolunga ange ʻa e mahuʻinga, ko e maʻolunga ange ia ʻa e leʻo.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e semitone liliu ʻo e māʻolunga ʻo e leʻo.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e lahi ʻo e loki ʻo e reverb.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e tupu ʻaʻau ʻo e reverb.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e fālahinga ʻo e reverb.
Specifies the overall quantity of epochs: ʻOku ne fakamahinoʻi ʻa e lahi fakakātoa ʻo e ngaahi epoch ki he founga ako ʻo e mōtele.
Specify the number of GPUs you wish to u: Fakamahinoʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo e ngaahi GPU ʻokú ke loto ke ngāueʻaki ki hono toʻo mai ʻaki hono fakahuu kinautolu ʻo vahevaheʻi ʻaki ha ngaahi vaofi (-).
Split the audio into chunks for inferenc: Vahevahe ʻa e ongo ki he ngaahi konga ki he fakafehokotaki ke maʻu ha ngaahi ola lelei ange ʻi ha ngaahi tūkunga.
Substitute or blend with the volume enve: Fetongi pe fakahekehekeʻi mo e tefitoʻi voliume ʻo e meʻa ʻoku hū atu. Ko e ofi ange ʻa e tio ki he 1, ko e lahi ange ia ʻa e ngāueʻaki ʻo e tefitoʻi voliume ʻo e meʻa ʻoku hū atu.
The GPU information will be displayed he: ʻE fakahā ʻa e fakamatala ʻo e GPU ʻi heni.
The audio file has been successfully add: Kuo tānaki lavameʻa ʻa e faile ongo ki he seti fakamatalá. Kātaki ʻo lomiʻi ʻa e meʻa-lomi ngāueʻi kimuʻa.
The button 'Upload' is only for google c: Ko e meʻa-lomi 'Upload' ʻoku ki he google colab pē: ʻOkú ne ʻupload ʻa e ngaahi faile naʻe hū atu ki he tōʻanga faile ApplioExported ʻi hoʻo Google Drive.
The f0 curve represents the variations i: ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻe he kave f0 ʻa e ngaahi liliu ʻi he tuʻunga fakaʻauliki ʻo ha leʻo ʻi he faai mai ʻa e taimi, ʻo fakahā ai ʻa e founga ʻoku māʻolunga mo maʻulalo ai ʻa e leʻo.
The file you dropped is not a valid pret: Ko e faile naʻá ke lī maí ʻoku ʻikai ko ha faile akoʻi mua totonu. Kātaki ʻo toe feinga.
The name that will appear in the model i: Ko e hingoa ʻe hā ʻi he fakamatala ʻo e mōtele.
The number of CPU cores to use in the ex: Ko e lahi ʻo e ngaahi ʻuti ʻo e CPU ke ngāueʻaki ʻi he founga toʻo mai. Ko e fekauʻaki tuʻumaʻu ko hoʻo ngaahi ʻuti ʻo e cpu, ʻa ia ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he lahi taha ʻo e ngaahi tūkunga.
The output information will be displayed: ʻE fakahā ʻa e fakamatala hū atu ʻi heni.
The path to the text file that contains: Ko e hala ki he faile kupuʻilea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e meʻa ki he kupuʻilea ki he lea.
The path where the output audio will be: Ko e hala ʻe seivi ai ʻa e ongo ʻoku hū atu, ʻi he tuʻunga tuʻumaʻu ʻi he assets/audios/output.wav
Ko e tuʻunga sampling ʻo e ngaahi faile ongo.
This setting enables you to save the wei: ʻOku fakangofua ʻe he fekauʻaki ko ʻeni ke ke seivi ʻa e ngaahi mamafa ʻo e mōtele ʻi he fakaʻosinga ʻo e epoch takitaha.
Timbre for formant shifting: Timbre ki he liliu ʻo e formant
Upload Audio Dataset: ʻUpload ʻa e Seti Fakamatalá ʻo e Ongo
Upload Pretrained Model: ʻUpload ʻa e Mōtele Akoʻi Mua
Utilize pretrained models when training: Ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi mōtele akoʻi mua ʻi he taimi ʻokú ke akoʻi ai hoʻo mōtele pē ʻaʻau. ʻOku fakasiʻisiʻi ʻe he founga ko ʻeni ʻa e lōloa ʻo e ako pea fakaleleiʻi ʻa e tuʻunga fakakātoa.
Utilizing custom pretrained models can l: ʻE lava ke iku ʻa e ngāueʻaki ʻo e ngaahi mōtele akoʻi mua fakafoʻituitui ki ha ngaahi ola lelei ange, he ko hono fili ʻo e ngaahi mōtele akoʻi mua feʻunga taha ʻoku fakahangatonu ki he tūkunga ngāueʻaki pau ʻe lava ke ne fakaleleiʻi lahi ʻa e lavameʻa.
Volume level below which audio is treate: Ko e tuʻunga ʻo e leʻó ʻa ia ʻoku lau ai ʻa e ongo ʻi laló ko e fakalongolongo pea ʻikai ngāueʻi. ʻOkú ne tokoni ke hao ai e ngaahi maʻuʻanga ivi ʻo e CPU pea fakasiʻisiʻi e longoaʻa ʻi tuʻá.
ʻE lava foki ke ke ngāueʻaki ha hala fakafoʻituitui.
